title: Lost bag

properties.value: The lost bag is an item that can be obtained from an intricate pouch, which can be received from the Rewards Guardian after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift. It has no stat bonuses and is purely cosmetic.

The lost bag is an item that can be obtained from an intricate pouch, which can be received from the Rewards Guardian after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift. It has no stat bonuses and is purely cosmetic.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Intricate pouchN/A 11/70

Transcript[edit | edit source]

The following text is transcluded from Transcript:Lost bag.

To whomever reads this,

I hope that this bag finds a home someday. It was a custom order for a client, but due to some unforeseen circumstances and a grave mistake on my part, they never received it.

As the years have gone on, it has weighed heavily on my mind. I've put too much work into this for it to simply sit on a shelf and be admired by me alone, so instead I intend to conjure a portal and thrust it in. It will then be cleared from my mind and left for fate to decide what becomes of it.

If someone is reading this, I hope that the bag brings you great fortune and success.

A wistful tailor.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The message seen when inspecting the bag is a reference to the similar-looking extradimensional bag:
    • Mod Husky created it as part of the Second Inventory relic of the Trailblazer League (a custom order).
    • However, it was scrapped due to a fatal bug found involving it shortly before release (unforeseen circumstances and a grave mistake on my part).
    • Despite this, the item itself was added to the game with no functionality and no way to obtain it (I've put too much work into this for it to simply sit on a shelf and be admired by me alone).
    • Hoping to repurpose the bag's appearance for another piece of content, Mod Husky added the lost bag as a reward from the Guardians of the Rift minigame, which he also co-developed (I intend to conjure a portal and thrust it in).
  • The bag resembles artwork of the 'Bag of Holding' from the tabletop game Dungeons and Dragons.

==Trivia==
* The message seen when inspecting the bag is a reference to the similar-looking [[extradimensional bag]]:
** [[Mod Husky]] created it as part of the [[Second Inventory]] relic of the [[Trailblazer League]] (''a custom order''). 
** However, it was scrapped due to a fatal bug found involving it shortly before release (''unforeseen circumstances and a grave mistake on my part'').
** Despite this, the item itself was added to the game with no functionality and no way to obtain it (''I've put too much work into this for it to simply sit on a shelf and be admired by me alone'').
** Hoping to repurpose the bag's appearance for another piece of content, Mod Husky added the lost bag as a reward from the [[Guardians of the Rift]] minigame, which he also co-developed (''I intend to conjure a portal and thrust it in'').
*The bag resembles artwork of the 'Bag of Holding' from the tabletop game ''Dungeons and Dragons''.

{{Guardians of the Rift}}
